page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: This section was prepared by the children of {OXSPRING J&I SCHOOL,}from class J1/J2 taught by Mrs.H Charlesworth, and the J3/J4 class taught by Mr.W Robinson. We would like to thank everyone who helped us on our travels. The Parents who came along, the Farmers who gave up their time and answered our questions, British Steel and Conoco for allowing us to visit parts of their holdings in the area but mostly, the children who worked hard to produce this record. Especially;- Tom payne, David Jones, Andrew Brown, Duncan Austin, Helen Thorp, Daniel Wlison, John Pennington, Garry Wilson, Robert Hinchcliffe, Jonathan Sudworth, who gave up playtimes etc. to finish the project off, also thanks to anyone we've missed off.
